Actions.Name: When a workflow is triggered on file(s)
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow when a file is uploaded/updated on the project. The trigger is fired to include sub-folders based on the workflow configuration.

Actions.Name: When a workflow is triggered on App(s)
Actions.Description: This operation triggers a flow when a form is created/updated on the project. Configure separate flows for each App.

Actions.Name: Get file content
Actions.Description: Retrieves the file content from Asite.

Actions.Name: Set file metadata
Actions.Description: Retrieves the defined file meta-data and sets the values during the file upload process. Note: it is mandatory to set this action before the Create file action is triggered.

Actions.Name: Create file
Actions.Description: Upload a file in Asite project folder.
